entry.title: Photos Post 29: Special Events (after 1975), Part 54
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 Photo of the special event 1993-0807 Public Talk, Moscow, Russia has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 medium resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the Photo in the smallest gallery: Collection 1993.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
